title: *sees Riot's considering buffing ADCs* Just go ahead and delete assassins, why not?
body:
Well, fuck assassins, am I right?
You might as well remove assassins from the game at this point.

You already made them unable to actually assassinate with every single reworked assassin needing at least 2 full seconds and landing their entire combo to even have a hope of killing a target. (Excluding the absurdly strong Kha'Zix and Rengar atm in comparison to the rest)
You didn't achieve your goal of making them even slightly more useful in teamfights vs the old.
You gutted important parts in return for cheap and flimsy gimmicks.
And they're still absurdly squishy.

Literally every other class does any actually helpful or good thing they do better.
Soaking damage? Tanks.
Pure damage (usually DPS) at close range? Fighters/divers/skirmishers.
Long range? Want AoE/burst? Mages. Want DPS? ADCs.
Want CC? Mages/support/tanks.
Want a mix by sacrificing some strength in damage and durability? Juggernauts.

And.… here we have assassins.
Single target.
Takes fucking forever to do their burst.
Squishy as hell.
Extremely short range.
Mobility… except that doesn't mean a flying fuck when no competent team would let you actually take advantage of it.

And now their intended prey is getting buffs?
And don't even get me started on Vayne's current Q squishy burst build trend being incredibly fucking stupid.

.endrant

So... where did they say they were considering buffing adc's. Meddler actually commented on Vayne nerfs.

Meddler alluded to the possibility of buffing other ADCs for the purposes of keeping Vayne down.

Which is bullshit because Vayne was still competing with them while Armor Pen builds still existed. 

It was the massive 40% increase her Q bonus damage got (from 50%->70%) that put her there and allowed her to ignore her early game weaknesses prior to preseason.
